title: Fried Chicken Waffles
instructions: Prepare the waffle batter according to your recipe and cook golden waffles in a preheated waffle iron.
Season the planted.chicken with paprika, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Heat oil in a deep pan to 180Â°C and fry the planted.chicken pieces until extra crispy, about 5-6 minutes.
Drain the fried chicken on paper towels.
Stack the crispy planted.chicken on top of warm waffles.
Drizzle generously with maple syrup and add a pat of butter. Serve immediately while hot and crispy.
